ScalarVariable.name: thruster_1_thruster_number
ScalarVariable.description: Thruster number (range 1→6)

ScalarVariable.name: thruster_1_rpm
ScalarVariable.description: Thruster RPM feedback (range -100.0→100.0%)

ScalarVariable.name: thruster_1_rpm_status
ScalarVariable.description: RPM input value is OK (A = OK, V = Not OK)

ScalarVariable.name: thruster_1_azimuth
ScalarVariable.description: Thruster azimuth feedback (range -180.0→180.0 degrees). This is thruster force direction (not flush direction), relative to vessel bow.

ScalarVariable.name: thruster_1_azimuth_status
ScalarVariable.description: Azimuth input value is OK (A = OK, V = Not OK)

ScalarVariable.name: thruster_1_running
ScalarVariable.description: Thruster running (A = running, V = not running)

ScalarVariable.name: thruster_1_ready
ScalarVariable.description: Thruster ready to be controlled by DP system (A = ready, V = not ready)

ScalarVariable.name: thruster_1_control_position
ScalarVariable.description: Thruster control position (2 = DP, 0 = None, 1 = Lever). Normally set this to 2.

ScalarVariable.name: thruster_2_thruster_number
ScalarVariable.description: Thruster number (range 1→6)

ScalarVariable.name: thruster_2_rpm
ScalarVariable.description: Thruster RPM feedback (range -100.0→100.0%)

ScalarVariable.name: thruster_2_rpm_status
ScalarVariable.description: RPM input value is OK (A = OK, V = Not OK)

ScalarVariable.name: thruster_2_azimuth
ScalarVariable.description: Thruster azimuth feedback (range -180.0→180.0 degrees). This is thruster force direction (not flush direction), relative to vessel bow.

ScalarVariable.name: thruster_2_azimuth_status
ScalarVariable.description: Azimuth input value is OK (A = OK, V = Not OK)

ScalarVariable.name: thruster_2_running
ScalarVariable.description: Thruster running (A = running, V = not running)

ScalarVariable.name: thruster_2_ready
ScalarVariable.description: Thruster ready to be controlled by DP system (A = ready, V = not ready)

ScalarVariable.name: thruster_2_control_position
ScalarVariable.description: Thruster control position (2 = DP, 0 = None, 1 = Lever). Normally set this to 2.

ScalarVariable.description: Thruster number (range 1→6)

ScalarVariable.name: thruster_3_rpm
ScalarVariable.description: Thruster RPM feedback (range -100.0→100.0%)

ScalarVariable.name: thruster_3_rpm_status
ScalarVariable.description: RPM input value is OK (A = OK, V = Not OK)

ScalarVariable.name: thruster_3_azimuth
ScalarVariable.description: Thruster azimuth feedback (range -180.0→180.0 degrees). This is thruster force direction (not flush direction), relative to vessel bow.

ScalarVariable.name: thruster_3_azimuth_status
ScalarVariable.description: Azimuth input value is OK (A = OK, V = Not OK)

ScalarVariable.name: thruster_3_running
ScalarVariable.description: Thruster running (A = running, V = not running)

ScalarVariable.name: thruster_3_ready
ScalarVariable.description: Thruster ready to be controlled by DP system (A = ready, V = not ready)

ScalarVariable.name: thruster_3_control_position
ScalarVariable.description: Thruster control position (2 = DP, 0 = None, 1 = Lever). Normally set this to 2.

ScalarVariable.name: RemoteIp
ScalarVariable.description: NMEA telegrams are sent to this remote host

ScalarVariable.name: RemotePort
ScalarVariable.description: NMEA telegrams are sent to this remote hoste
